## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                   | Type     | Default    |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------- | ---------- |
| `type`     | `type`     | Which Profile: member, team                   | `string` | `"member"` |
| `username` | `username` | ID For the profile. Username, Team ID, Org ID | `string` | `""`       |
